forum.content:
拍攝Jack Black到烏干達探訪一名12歲男孩的日常生活。雖然並非最新影片、也不一定是最辛苦的個案、希望可以讓大家感受到其實自己生活的環境還是很不錯的🙏
Felix tells Black that what he wants most in the world is to learn in school, but for now, he sleeps in what is essentially a garbage dump. “It’s unfathomable,” says Black. “This is no place for a 12-year-old to be sleeping alone.”

urls.title: Red Nose Day   Jack Black and Felix Episode Highlight

forum.title: Red Nose Day / 紅鼻子慈善日
